meanings.english_definition: A surname of Ashkenazi Jewish origin.
Grigori Yakovlevich Perelman (Григо́рий Я́ковлевич Перельма́н; born 13 June 1966) is a Russian mathematician who has made landmark contributions to Riemannian geometry and geometric topology.

etymology.value: Likely a variant of Perlman, a Jewish surname.
